ITEM&#160;5.07. SUBMISSION OF MATTERS TO A VOTE OF SECURITY HOLDERS. &#160; On May&#160;22, 2024, Amazon.com,&#160;Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) held its Annual Meeting of Shareholders. &#160; The following nominees were elected as directors, each to hold office until the next Annual Meeting of Shareholders or until his or her successor is elected and qualified, by the vote set forth below: &#160; Nominee &#160; For &#160; &#160; Against &#160; &#160; Abstain &#160; &#160; Broker Non-Votes &#160; Jeffrey P.
